life_expectancy.name: Life expectancy
life_expectancy.method: Use World Bank annual series as provided; include only numeric values; round to 2 decimals.

co2_ppm.name: COâ‚‚ (Global)
co2_ppm.method: Annual mean of monthly averages, exclude -99.99; round to 2 decimals.

u5_mortality.name: Under-5 mortality
u5_mortality.source_org: UN IGME via World Bank WDI
u5_mortality.method: Pop-weighted global mean from national SH.DYN.MORT using SP.POP.TOTL; exclude aggregates; round 2 decimals; WDI may include modeled/nowcasted values.

extreme_poverty.name: Extreme poverty ($2.15)
extreme_poverty.method: Pop-weighted global mean from national SI.POV.DDAY using SP.POP.TOTL; exclude aggregates; round 2 decimals; WDI may include modeled/nowcasted values.
